title: Adding bots to custom games gone?
body: So I like to make custom games and throw in a bot to test out my builds and see how they work but with the new client update I can't seem to find where you add in bots to your games. Is it gone?

replies.body:
Bots aren't available on the updated client yet.  You can still access them through the legacy client if you like:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I'm not sure when it will be added, but feel free to share any feedback on the [client boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)and help out with other areas of the client until then.  Thanks for your help!
